Hiya, Joe

Thanks for even trying. :) I just don't know how to explain it b=
etter 
without posting all the code for a "chunk", but a) you REALLY don't =

want to wade through all that, and b) I'm not sure the client would 
like =
it!

But I reckon you've got it there. We can & do JUnit it all, but it's 
=
just such a big job to do. You're right that I can't, say, test 
anything a=
bout one Domain object without JMocking it's DAO and half a 
dozen more to =
make it with, and setting up their stubs & expects & so 
on. 
But maybe tha=
t's normal? 

Cheers for the pointers to those books - I believe Da Boss is=
 looking 
for some reading recommendations for us, so that's perfect!
  
Th=
anks a bunch,
Tracey
